snippet.title: Judgment - Announce Trailer | PS5
snippet.description:
Remastered for next-gen consoles, acclaimed action thriller Judgment is coming to PlayStation 5 on April 23rd, 2021.

Join detective Takayuki Yagami as he claws through Kamurocho’s criminal underground in an attempt to unravel the truth.

Rated Mature:  Blood, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol
